definitions.definition: Giving the appearance of carelessness ; relaxedly .
examples: The papers were carelessly strewn on the table.

definitions.definition: Done without care or attention; inattentively .
examples: Distracted by the salesperson, he carelessly read the contract.

main_definition: Giving the appearance of carelessness ; relaxedly .
secondary_definitions: Done without care or attention; inattentively .
